statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.PartnerID , AA.BankAccountID , AA.BankAccountType , AA.Description
, M1.Name as BankAccountTypeName
FROM dbo.TPartnerBankAccount AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 with (nolock) ON AA.BankAccountType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'BankAccountType' WHERE AA.PartnerID = #PartnerID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TPartnerBankAccount AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TPartnerBankAccount ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, PartnerID, BankAccountID, BankAccountType, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #PartnerID#, #BankAccountID#, #BankAccountType#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TPartnerBankAccount SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, PartnerID = #PartnerID# , BankAccountID = #BankAccountID# , BankAccountType = #BankAccountType# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
